The directory Build has project files to build the libraries using
VisualStudio 2015/2017/2019 ; use all_libs.sln. They are set up to access
source files from directories in this directory called :

zlib-1.2.12
freetype-2.12.1
jpeg-9d
libpng-1.6.37
libgd-2.3.3
curl-7.83.1
szip-2.1.1
hdf5-1.12.0
netcdf-c-4.8.1
netcdf-fortran-4.5.4

This is obviously the versions of the source files used.

They are available from :

zlib           : http://www.zlib.net/
freetype       : http://www.freetype.org/download.html
jpeg           : http://www.ijg.org/
libpng         : http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html
libgd          : http://libgd.github.io/
curl           : https://curl.haxx.se/download.html
szip           : https://support.hdfgroup.org/doc_resource/SZIP/
hdf5           : https://www.hdfgroup.org/downloads/hdf5/source-code/
netcdf &
netcdf-fortran : https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/downloads/netcdf/index.jsp

zlib-1.2.12.tar.gz          http://www.zlib.net/zlib-1.2.12.tar.gz
zlib-1212.zip               http://www.zlib.net/zlib1212.zip

freetype-2.10.1.tar.gz       https://download.savannah.gnu.org/releases/freetype/freetype-2.12.1.tar.gz

jpegsrc.v9e.tar.gz          http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9e.tar.gz
jpegsr9e.zip                http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsr9e.zip

libpng-1.6.37.tar.gz        http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/libpng/libpng-1.6.37.tar.gz?download
lpng1637.zip                http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/libpng/lpng1637.zip?download

libgd-2.3.3.tar.gz          https://github.com/libgd/libgd/releases/download/gd-2.3.3/libgd-2.3.3.tar.gz

curl-7.83.1.tar.gz          https://curl.haxx.se/download/curl-7.83.1.tar.gz
curl-7.83.1.zip             https://curl.haxx.se/download/curl-7.83.1.zip

szip-2.1.1.tar.gz           https://support.hdfgroup.org/ftp/lib-external/szip/2.1.1/src/szip-2.1.1.tar.gz

hdf5-1.12.0.tar.gz          https://www.hdfgroup.org/package/hdf5-1-12-0-tar-gz/?wpdmdl=14135&refresh=5e5f47f69f23f1583302646
hdf5-1.12.0.zip             https://www.hdfgroup.org/package/hdf5-1-12-0-zip/?wpdmdl=14136&refresh=5e5f47f69e23d1583302646

netcdf-c-4.8.1.zip          https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/downloads/netcdf/ftp/netcdf-c-4.8.1.zip
netcdf-c-4.8.1.tar.gz       https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/downloads/netcdf/ftp/netcdf-c-4.8.1.tar.gz

netcdf-fortran-4.5.4.tar.gz https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/downloads/netcdf/ftp/netcdf-fortran-4.5.4.tar.gz
netcdf-fortran-4.5.4.zip    https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/downloads/netcdf/ftp/netcdf-fortran-4.5.4.zip
